department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description:
tall, flat shaft decorated with beading throughout; multicolored triangles and diamonds on back; geometric designs in rectangles on front; 4 pairs of earlike protrusions on sides with lines of beads; 2 small pocketlike protrusions at top corners; removable head with beaded face with large round eyes; 2 three-dimensional beaded zebras flank a small bowl on front; attached to mount.
Arms and Armor-Accessory
title: Sheath
